alert.note: Alert for Duval; Inland Kleberg; Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio; Jim Wells; Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued February 03 at 3:23AM CST until February 05 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST FRIDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 possible. * WHERE...Webb, Duval, Jim Wells, Inland Kleberg, Inland Nueces and Inland San Patricio Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 9 PM this evening to noon CST Friday. For the Freeze Watch, from Friday evening through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Duval; Inland Kleberg; Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio; Jim Wells; Webb
